DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy vitrectomy invert internal limiting membrane ( ILM ) flap technique macular hole retinal detachment ( MHRD ) highly myopic eye , demonstrate postoperative clinical course MHRD invert ILM flap technique use swept-source optical coherence tomography ( OCT )
DOC.brief_title: Inverted Internal Limiting Membrane Flap Technique Macular Hole Retinal Detachment Highly Myopic Eyes
DOC.detailed_description: Macular hole retinal detachment ( MHRD ) threaten certain number highly myopic patient irreversible visual dysfunction , mostly require immediate surgical intervention . The aim study evaluate efficacy vitrectomy invert internal limiting membrane ( ILM ) flap technique MHRD highly myopic eye , demonstrate postoperative clinical course MHRD invert ILM flap technique use swept-source optical coherence tomography .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion patient underwent vitrectomy internal limit membrane removal invert macular hole retinal detachment follow 6 month . The patient followup less 6 month .
